title: Various fonts, please help
content:
Dear all

I have 3 files with texts that I don't know the font of (marked "?"). I've tried to fit a font next to them but have been unsuccesful and specified which font I was using trying to fit the texts.

Please, can you help me out identifying the fonts?

Thank you in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426231502/http:/typophile.com/files/1_80.jpg) | 18.84 KB |
| [2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426231502/http:/typophile.com/files/2_56.jpg) | 43.95 KB |
| [3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426231502/http:/typophile.com/files/3_29.jpg) | 17.8 KB |
author: jaime11

comments.content:
That’s the system font of your OS with no [anti-aliasing](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426231502/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anti-aliasing). That makes it not easy to identify. Which system are you using?

Meanwhile, compare your font with the [list of windows fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426231502/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anti-aliasing).
